definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: We were moved by the great courage and solidarity of the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 我們爲中國人民的堅強不屈和團結一致而感動。

sentences.english: Nanjing Plum Flower and Hong Kong bauhinia flower has a strong and unyielding character.
sentences.chinese: 南京市花梅花與香港區花紫荊花都有堅強不屈的性格。
